dict.acceptation: 完全地，十足地；纯粹地；纯洁地，贞淑地；

sent.orig: This story is purely fictional. Any similarity is purely coincidental.
sent.trans: 总的来说，是个哲理故事。

sent.orig: Theoritically speaking, the Chinese farmer's social position is purely high.
sent.trans: 纯粹从理论上来说，中国农民的社会地位较高。

sent.orig: You should resist siren songs from the luxury brands. Those are purely marketing stunts.
sent.trans: 那些名牌子的诱人广告不过是宣传伎俩，不要受骗啊！

sent.orig: Entire document altogether 19 alone purely North America style big dwelling.
sent.trans: 全案共19栋独栋纯粹北美风格大宅。

sent.orig: What was worst of all was that the work was by no means purely mechanical.
sent.trans: 最糟糕的是，这项工作一点也不是纯粹机械性的。
